snippet: Mr. Manafort leaves nearly a week after a report about problems within the Republican nominee’s campaign helped precipitate a leadership shake-up....
abstract: Donald Trump's campaign manager Paul Manafort resigns amid controversy over his business dealings with Russia-aligned leaders in Ukraine that allegedly involved millions of dollars in cash payments and secret lobbying efforts in United States; Manafort's exit comes as Trump tries to reboot his campaign following disastrous stretch in which he committed series of gaffes, and it remains to be seen who will step into Manafort’s role of chief strategist for final 11 weeks until Election Day.

byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and JONATHAN MARTIN

lead_paragraph: Mr. Manafort leaves nearly a week after a report about problems within the Republican nominee’s campaign helped precipitate a leadership shake-up.

headline.main: Paul Manafort Quits Donald Trump’s Campaign After a Tumultuous Run
headline.print_headline: Add Manafort to Casualties of Trump Bid
